WorkItem.Description:
I downloaded the documentation files, HtmlAgilityPack.Documentation.chm and HtmlAgilityPack.Documentation.chw files and when I cliked on the HtmlAgilityPack.Documentation.chm no documentation is displayed when I click on a selection. Is there some step I need to perform to view the doucmentation?
I cna be reached at steve_44@inbox.com
WorkItem.Summary: HTML AGILITY Documentation displays no documentation

Comments.Message: When you download a .chm, you need to right-click the file, choose properties and then click the "Unblock"-button. If you need more detailed instructions, just google it since it is mentioned in about a million places on the web.
